personalInfo.name: Kamila
personalInfo.myDescription: I am a novice developer, graduated from the university in the direction of “09.03.04 Software Engineering”, I have also been studying at School 21 for 2 years. Now I am intensively studying the Frontend direction, I am also completing an internship in the POS terminal Maintenance department, where I write scripts in python to automate manual processes, applications and Telegram bots (* the department in which I train is not a development department, so I do not plan further development in the department after the internship).
